item.description:
Hi guys,

The Super 15 final between the Queensland Reds and the Canterbury Crusaders is being played this Saturday Boston time and is shaping up to be a classic.  We are going to organise to watch a replay of the match around midday on Saturday.  The event will be at a private residence so if you want to attend please RSVP to the invite and I will send you the details.

Cheers,

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Super 15 final: Queensland Reds vs Canterbury Crusaders
